reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is the most phenomenonal spy cam ever made!!!
reviews.reviewText: Wonder if your spouse is cheating? Want to know what people say about you when you leave the room? Well with this pen camera that will never be an issue again. This little gadget has the ability to do multiple different things! Not only can it take pictures but it can take videos in 1080 quality, also has the ability to take voice recordings and most impressive of all is the motion detection feature!!! What more could you ask for? It even comes with a 64 gigabyte SD card and multiple pen replacements, oh yeah almost forgot it actually is a working pen!! I highly recommend this product to everyone especially those of you that suspect someone cheating, stealing or slandering your character. I know I'll be asleep better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Featuring a discreet 2mm lens for effortless capture of life's moments. With impressive 1080p capabilities, expandable storage up to 128GB, and 70 minutes of continuous operation, this mini camera stands out. The included 64GB card, card reader, and excellent customer support make it a must-have for discreet and efficient recording.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was quite pleased when my new pen arrived. It looks like a regular pen. You can just leave it on your desk and no one would suspect it was more than just an average pen. The ballpoint ink cartridges allow you to write with it as well. It is so much more than just an average pen. It has a motion detection function. I love being able to tell if someone is in my office when I am not there. You can discreetly record video and recharging it is a breeze.I just plug it into my computer and not worry about leaving it on my desk. Using the mini SD card I have plenty of room for storage. It takes great pictures as well as videos. You can also take notes and store them safely for later.NOTE: If you have a need to monitor your desk or your lunch this is a great option

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Stopped working after a day.
reviews.reviewText: Worked great on the first day then it stopped. The top button gets stuck a lot and when it doesn’t get stuck the spy pen won’t turn on. I tried resetting it but that didn’t work. Pics and video are pretty good and it’s a fun little piece of tech. Too bad it stopped working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Records audio too! I wasn't sure originally if it would record audio, but it does. Camera lens hides pretty well, as shown in my two pictures. Pen is not too thick, so it does not look fake. Easily passes as regular pen. Memory card is good it is 64 Gigabytes. Works surprisingly well, for the price it's worth it. Better than expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Camera Full HD
reviews.reviewText: The quality of the video is very stunning, with vivid colors and a high level of detail. I put it through its paces in a variety of lighting scenarios, and it performed well even when there was very little light. You will be able to keep an eye on a large area thanks to the wide-angle lens. Currently, I have it positioned such that I can watch both my living room and my kitchen at the same time without any difficulty. Inserting the microSD card was all that was required to get everything set up; after that, you were good to go. Based on the requirements that you have, you may choose from a few different recording modes. In most cases, I have it configured to detect motion, which means that it will only record when it detects movement. This eliminates the need for me to go through hours of material that is completely pointless. When I log in, I am able to see what is happening at home even when I am not physically present there. The range of the wifi is also really impressive. I have successfully checked in from my place of employment as well as from a variety of other locations across the city.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: So while its in motion detection mode, it stops working/ recording any motion.i had 3 different clips, about 10 mins total.Every other movements after that were not recorded, and I'm talking about within a 1hr time frame.And it was fully charged, so it's not like it ran out of power
